Token.Abstract: MSDynamicsDrawerViewController is a container view controller that manages the presentation of a single "pane" view controller overlaid over one or two "drawer" view controllers. The drawer view controllers are hidden by default, but can be exposed by a user-initiated swipe in the direction that that drawer view controller is set in.
The pane view controller is the primary view controller, displayed centered and covering the drawer view controllers.
The pane view controller is the primary view controller, displayed centered and covering the drawer view controllers.
The pane view controller is the primary view controller, displayed centered and covering the drawer view controllers.
Sets the paneViewController with an animated transition.

Parameter.Name: paneViewController
Parameter.Abstract: The paneViewController to be added.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: Whether adding the pane should be animated.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: An optional completion block called upon the completion of the paneViewController being set.

Token.Abstract: Sets the view controller to be revealed as a drawer in the specified direction underneath the pane view controller.

Parameter.Name: drawerViewController
Parameter.Abstract: The view controller to revealed as a drawer

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the drawer view controller should be revealed in. Does not accept masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Returns the drawer view controller that has been set for the specified direction.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the drawer view controller should be revealed. Must not be masked.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The drawer view controller that has been set for the specified direction. If not yet set, nil.

Token.Abstract: If setting a new paneViewController should have an animation that slides off the old view controller before animating the new one into its place.
If setting a new paneViewController should have an animation that slides off the old view controller before animating the new one into its place.
If setting a new paneViewController should have an animation that slides off the old view controller before animating the new one into its place.
If the status bar should align with the pane view as the pane view frame is adjusted by both the user gestures and the internal dynamic animator.
If the status bar should align with the pane view as the pane view frame is adjusted by both the user gestures and the internal dynamic animator.
If the status bar should align with the pane view as the pane view frame is adjusted by both the user gestures and the internal dynamic animator.
The state of the pane view as defined in a MSDynamicsDrawerPaneState.
The state of the pane view as defined in a MSDynamicsDrawerPaneState.
The state of the pane view as defined in a MSDynamicsDrawerPaneState.
The state of the pane view as defined in a MSDynamicsDrawerPaneState.

Parameter.Name: paneState
Parameter.Abstract: The state that the pane view controller should be updated to be in.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the paneState update should be applied in.

Token.Abstract: Sets the state of the pane view as defined in a MSDynamicsDrawerPaneState.

Parameter.Name: paneState
Parameter.Abstract: The state that the pane view controller should be updated to be in.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: Whether the transition should be animated.

Parameter.Name: allowUserInterruption
Parameter.Abstract: If the user should be able to interrupt the pane state transition with gestures.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Called upon completion of the update to the pane state. If the user interrupts the transition, the completion will be called when the internal dynamic animator completes.

Token.Abstract: Sets the state of the pane view as defined in a MSDynamicsDrawerPaneState.

Parameter.Name: paneState
Parameter.Abstract: The state that the pane view controller should be updated to be in.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the paneState update should be applied in.

Parameter.Name: animated
Parameter.Abstract: Whether the transition should be animated.

Parameter.Name: allowUserInterruption
Parameter.Abstract: If the user should be able to interrupt the pane state transition with gestures.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: Called upon completion of the update to the pane state. If the user interrupts the transition, the completion will be called when the internal dynamic animator completes.

Token.Abstract: The amount that the paneView should be offset from the edge of the screen when set to the MSDynamicsDrawerPaneStateOpenWide.
The amount that the paneView should be offset from the edge of the screen when set to the MSDynamicsDrawerPaneStateOpenWide.
The amount that the paneView should be offset from the edge of the screen when set to the MSDynamicsDrawerPaneStateOpenWide.
Bounces the paneView open to reveal the drawerView underneath.
Bounces the paneView open to reveal the drawerView underneath. Executes completion when the dynamic animation finishes.

Parameter.Name: allowingUserInterruption
Parameter.Abstract: If the user should be able to interrupt the bounce animation with gestures.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is run when the dynamic animator finishes animating the bounce.

Token.Abstract: Bounces the paneView open in the specified direction, revealing the drawerView underneath.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the paneView will be bounced open in. ?

Token.Abstract: Bounces the paneView open in the specified direction, revealing the drawerView underneath. Executes completion when the dynamic animation finishes.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the paneView will be bounced open in.

Parameter.Name: allowUserInterruption
Parameter.Abstract: If the user should be able to interrupt the bounce animation with gestures.

Parameter.Name: completion
Parameter.Abstract: A block that is run when the dynamic animator finishes animating the bounce.

Token.Abstract: The directions that the paneView can be opened in.
The directions that the paneView can be opened in.

Sets if a user-initiated pan gesture on the paneView can move the pane in the specified direction.

Parameter.Name: paneDraggingEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: Whether dragging should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that dragging should be enabled for. Accepts masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Returns if a user-initiated pan gesture on the paneView can move the pane in the specified direction.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction to check against. Does not accept masked direction values.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If dragging is enabled in the specified direction.

Token.Abstract: Sets if a user-initiated tap gesture on the paneView can close it while it is opened.

Parameter.Name: paneTapToCloseEnabled
Parameter.Abstract: Whether tap-to-close should be enabled.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that tap-to-close should be enabled for. Accepts masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Returns if a user-initiated tap gesture on the paneView can close it while it is opened.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction to check against. Does not accept masked direction values.

ReturnValue.Abstract: If tap-to-close is enabled for the specified direction.

Token.Abstract: Whether the only pans that can open the drawer should be those that originate from the screen's edges.
Whether the only pans that can open the drawer should be those that originate from the screen's edges.
Whether the only pans that can open the drawer should be those that originate from the screen's edges.
Whether gestures that start at the edge of the screen should be cancelled under the assumption that the user is dragging the pane view to reveal a drawer underneath.

Attempts to register a UIView subclass that the pane view should forward dragging through.

Parameter.Name: touchForwardingClass
Parameter.Abstract: The class that should not allow pan gestures through.

Token.Abstract: Adds a styler (a class that conforms to the MSDynamicsDrawerStyler protocol).

Parameter.Name: styler
Parameter.Abstract: The styler that should be added.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the styler apply to. Accepts masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Removes a styler (a class that conforms to the MSDynamicsDrawerStyler protocol).

Parameter.Name: styler
Parameter.Abstract: The styler that should be removed.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that they styler should be removed for. Accepts masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Adds an array of stylers (classes that conform to the MSDynamicsDrawerStyler protocol).

Parameter.Name: stylers
Parameter.Abstract: The array of stylers that should be added.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the stylers apply to. Accepts masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Returns an array of the stylers that are set in a specified direction

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the stylers should be returned for. Accepts masked direction values.

ReturnValue.Abstract: An array of stylers that are

Token.Abstract: Sets the maximum width that the paneView opens when revealing the drawerView underneath for the specified direction.

Parameter.Name: maxRevealWidth
Parameter.Abstract: The width that the paneView opens when revealing the drawerView.

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the maxRevealWidth should be applied in. Accepts masked direction values.

Token.Abstract: Returns the reveal width that the paneView opens when revealing the drawerView for the specified direction

Parameter.Name: direction
Parameter.Abstract: The direction that the reveal width should be returned for. Does not accept masked direction values.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The reveal width for the specified direction.

Token.Abstract: Returns the current distance (in points) that the drawer is opened to.
